title: 跪求1.6.2的圣诞惊魂夜过山车存档
author: 囧星人

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 變異六頭凋零
replies.txt_content:
他们没有也不会放出存档，这是在XBOX360上做的，所以没有放出存档，不过他们在他们的服务器上开始重建这个，你可以去他们服务器看看甚至帮忙搭一下
原话
*This map will not be available for download but we are currently rebuilding all our coasters and new ones on The Emerald Isle server (opening soon) with our awesome friend and partner ChooChoo at ChooChoosGaming, so that you will be able to enjoy them there!
http://minecraft.gamedog.cn/jianzhuwu/20131220/343270.html 你自己开创造建一个吧!
